entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:33 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this morning. Snow mixed with ice pellets and rain late this afternoon. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow at times mixed with rain this evening. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
